import React,{ useState,useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; import CustomLoader from '../custom_loader' export default function Dashboard() { const [menusData, setMenusData] = useState([]); const [laodingStatus,setlaodingStatus] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { setlaodingStatus(true) axios.get(`menu`) .then(res => { setMenusData([...menusData]) setlaodingStatus(false) alert(JSON.stringify(res.data)) }).catch(error => { setlaodingStatus(false) alert(JSON.stringify(error.data)) }) }, []) return (
